description:
Flickr Addict HD brings an almost unlimited number of great quality wallpapers to your phone and TouchPad.  Wallpapers are rotated and downloaded automatically, with no effort required from you.  It's also great as a photo frame and can show all your favorite Flickr photos at an interval you choose.

Flickr Addict HD does not require a Flickr account, but if you have one, you can use it to quickly add photos to your favorites.

Flickr Addict HD is completely configurable, but also really easy to use. Users can simply get the best quality photos from Flickr each day, while power users can pick Flickr users, groups, tags and photo sets to download.

Have complete control over what's downloaded, from searching through to blocking both individual photos and users.  You'll never have to stare at a boring wallpaper again!

For much, much more Flickr goodness, check out Flickr Mundo HD for photo upload/download and everything you could want from a Flickr client.

--------------------
v1.6.8 Fixes some small bugs
